sentences.sContent: families who hoarded food during the strike
sentences.sCn: 罢工期间囤积食品的家庭

remMethod.val: 把粮食贮藏(hoard)在宽的(broad)木板(board)后面

words.tran: [贸易] 囤积；贮藏；临时围墙

trans.tranOther: to collect and save large amounts of food, money etc, especially when it is not necessary to do so
a collection of things that someone hides somewhere, especially so they can use them later
